query:
INSERT INTO daily_progress (
                    user_id, scope_type, scope_id, date,
                    new_cards_seen, review_cards_seen
                )
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, 1, 0)
                ON CONFLICT(user_id, scope_type, scope_id, date)
                DO UPDATE SET
                    new_cards_seen = new_cards_seen + 1,
                    updated_at = datetime('now')
